results.title: Sleep-related changes in cardiovascular autonomic regulation in left coronary artery ligation rats: Neural mechanism facilitating arrhythmia after myocardial infarction.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Our results demonstrate significant @<m>DISEASE_Sleep_Deprivation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012892 @@@sleep fragmentations@@@ with @DISEASE_Hyperkinesis @DISEASE_MESH:D006948 @@@sympathetic hyperactivity@@@ during QS stages after MI, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ could restore the @DISEASE_Autonomic_Nervous_System_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001342 @@@autonomic dysfunction@@@ and @DISEASE_Sleep_Wake_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D012893 @@@sleep disturbance@@@.
